text: @chuckwestover @funder @MittRomney @realDonaldTrump Every GOP Senator, other than Romney, broke their oaths of office & as jurors in acquitting Trump. This led to the disastrous COVID-19 crisis, & enabling Trump’s unethical & criminal activity before & during his time in office & for that they must be fired in next 2 elections.
